datoCmsKey.name: Maddy Mathias

headshot.title: Maddy Mathias, headshot via Editor, 2:38:59 AM 12/30/2020

datoCmsKey.bio: Hi friends! I grew up in the LDS church and I have very thankful to have finally found my way into a community and family that makes me feel comfortable in my body. I am in the most loving relationship with my partner, Gracen Barth, and I am excited to bring awareness to our queer community!
